title: 05/28/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 05/28/21 DPS Best Of
description:
In this Best Of The Dan Patrick Show, Dan is joined by Yankees manager Aaron Boone. The former MLB player and current pinstripe captain discusses his style in arguing balls and strikes--and how former Yankee great Derek Jeter was actually an elite "six-tool" player. Also, old friend and colleague (and current radio and television host) Rich Eisen calls in to surprise Dan to tell a story about an experience he had with his kids at the Super Bowl. Plus, ESPN NBA color analyst and former NBA head coach Jeff Van Gundy explains why Shaq was the most dominant player he ever faced.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Also, old friend and colleague (and current radio and television host) Rich Eisen calls in to surprise Dan to tell a story about an experience he had with his kids at the Super Bowl. Plus, ESPN NBA color analyst and former NBA head coach Jeff Van Gundy explains why Shaq was the most dominant player he ever faced.
